task.text2: TASK is an AI agent designed to automate and manage your online tasks.

ads.label: ADVERTISING
ads.title: ADS AI - Your advertising boosted by Artificial Intelligence
ads.description: Gain visibility and attract more customers with ADS AI, an AI specialized in creating and optimizing your advertising campaigns.

token.heading: The WZC Token - A crypto of the future for entrepreneurs
token.description: WZC is not just a token, it's an opportunity for entrepreneurs to position themselves today in the digital ecosystem of tomorrow. As BizzWiz platform's cryptocurrency, the WZC token offers exclusive benefits to users, while having growth potential in the blockchain and crypto universe.

card1.title: Exclusive Offers and Discounts
card1.description: Use the WZC token to get discounts on our services and special offers reserved for our members.

card2.title: Access to Premium Features
card2.description: The token allows you to access advanced tools and features on our platform to grow your business.

card3.title: Participate in the Future of Crypto
card3.description: Invest in the WZC token and be part of our ambitious project that aims to revolutionize the digital universe and small businesses.

future.title: WZC, a crypto with a future
future.description: BizzWiz invests in blockchain innovation to make the WZC token a key player in the digital ecosystem.
future.callToAction: Don't miss this chance to prepare for the future. Start today with WZC!

testimonials.heading: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Don't leave your advertising to chance anymore! ADS AI generates impactful ads, optimizes them in real-time, and maximizes your return on investment. Automate your visibility and attract more customers effortlessly.

testimonial1.name: Jean M
testimonial1.quote: Thanks to ADS AI, I've multiplied my online sales without touching the ads. The AI optimizes everything by itself, it's amazing!

testimonial2.name: Sophie L
testimonial2.quote: I knew nothing about advertising, but with ADS AI, my traffic exploded in just a few weeks! A real revolution for my business.

testimonial3.name: David R
testimonial3.quote: I used to spend hours adjusting my campaigns. Now, ADS AI does it for me and with better results. A must-have!

community.heading: Join the community
community.description: Join our community of over 4,000 people and contribute to a more private and decentralized Internet. Start for free.

prompt.placeholder: Describe your dream logo with as much detail as possible...

tips.title: Tips for better logo prompts:
items: Specify the business name and industry
Mention preferred colors or color scheme
Describe the style (minimalist, modern, vintage, etc.)
Suggest graphic elements or symbols to include
Mention any fonts or typography preferences

autoRenewal.title: Enable Auto-Renewal
autoRenewal.enabledInfo: Your subscription will automatically renew every {{term}} until cancelled. You can cancel anytime in your account settings.
autoRenewal.disabledInfo: Your subscription will expire after {{duration}} without renewal. You'll need to manually subscribe again.

disclaimer.securityNotice: Your payment is processed securely through Stripe. We do not store your card details.
